Literature.Title: Identification and Characterization of the First Cathelicidin from Sea Snakes with Potent Antimicrobial and Anti-inflammatory Activity, and Special Mechanism.
Literature.Author: Wei L, Gao J, Zhang S, Wu S, Xie Z, Ling G, Kuang Y, Yang Y, Yu H, Wang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>200µg/ml),Candida albicans 1(MIC=75µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila(MIC=9.38µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus(MIC=75µg/ml)
